title: Twitter removes labels from state-controlled media, helping propaganda
description: The move came the same week that Russia and China were revealed to have been operating armies of fake social media profiles to sway U.S. debate.

title: SpaceX didn’t want to blow up its launchpad. It may have done just that.
description: Videos shared on social media showed debris slamming into a van several hundred feet away and striking the nearby beach and the shoreline as if ithey were a war zone.

title: Never Google ‘free credit report.’ Do this instead.
description: Never search the web if you're looking for free credit reports. Google ads lead you away from a government-mandated free service.

title: Elon Musk has had a wild week. Now he wants to start an AI company.
description: Musk is entering the field responsible for ChatGPT, but some worry his ambitions have lost their luster after failed promises and a tumultuous reign at Twitter.
